name: Maryam Jibrin Wunti
bio: My name is Maryam Jibrin Wunti and I am the Vice President-Internal Affairs of NUMSA 23/24 administration. I'm from Bauchi State but lived most of my life in Lagos. I love to organize and spend my free time watching anime and writing poems. My life motto is 'Make a positive impact in the lives of everyone you encounter' and my mission in NUMSA is to create a community where every member matters and every member has an opportunity to achieve their goals.
